title: Tantei Shounen Kageman
synopsis: Kageman is a boy who wants to become the best detective in the world. Each of the self-contained episode features a fun guessing game and unriddling of a case.
staff: [['Ohata, Kiyotaka', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Sadohara, Takeyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Kume, Issei', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Makino, Takashi', ['Theme Song Composition']]]
